divs: Sighting DetailsWent to Mount Wilson observatory and downloaded five photos that are two minutes apart, then I increased the brightness on them and this is what I saw! You will see that the object was traveling away from Mount Wilson and its too BIG to be a jet and it does not even look like a jet! So you all decide what it is because I have no ideal. Photos are time stamped from Mount Wilson and they have not been modified accept to add a little light to them. Now I uploaded three photos that show the UFO speeding past Mount Wilson.
trends: There have been 404 other sightings in Los Angeles
There was one other sighting in Los Angeles on or around January 28th 2011
This sighting has never been favorited.
